apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji beautifully depicts a couple with the woman appearing with a light skin tone, embraced within a soft, glowing heart.  The signature Apple 3D shading gives the figures a tangible presence, while the heart radiates with a gentle luminescence, symbolizing deep affection and connection.  Its smooth gradients and rounded edges convey a sense of tender intimacy, making it a perfect visual for expressing love and partnership.
